title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1901.6 - Eligibility of underoccupied residential property -special requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1901.6 - Eligibility of underoccupied residential property -special requirements

State Regulations
(a) All units in a
building containing an underoccupied residential property project, but which
are not a part of said project, shall meet the requirements of the State

Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code and local building codes which have
determined to be more stringent. (b) An underoccupied residential property
project may substitute an apartment in the building of the project which is not
a part of the project provided that the apartment is comparable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1901.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
